sn7.17:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn7.17:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena navakammikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe kammantaṃ kārāpeti.
sn7.17:4.3: Addasā kho navakammikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sālarukkhamūle nisinnaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
sn7.17:4.5: “ahaṃ kho imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe kammantaṃ kārāpento ramāmi.
sn7.17:4.6: Ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo kiṃ kārāpento ramatī”ti?
sn7.17:4.7: Atha kho navakammikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn7.17:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, navakammikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.17:7.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
